verses.verse: In the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> after the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H3318>gone<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on that very <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

When they <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H7508>Rephidim,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H5048>front<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

'You <S%H9043>yourselves<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and [how] I <S%H5375>bore<s%> you on eagles' <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> you to Myself.

<S%H6258>'Now<s%> then, <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>indeed<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> My <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> then you shall be My own <S%H5459>possession<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is Mine;

and you shall be to Me a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3548>priests<s%> and a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>' <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> that you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>"All<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do!<s%>" And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you in a <S%H5672>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> in <S%H5668>order<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you, and may <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H539>believe<s%> in you <S%H5769>forever.<s%>" Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> them <S%H3117>today<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H8071>garments;<s%>

and let them be <S%H3559>ready<s%> for the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> for on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H1379>set<s%> <S%H1379>bounds<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8104>'Beware<s%> that you do not <S%H5927>go<s%> up on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> or <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H7097>border<s%> of it; <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H3808>'No<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> him, but he shall <S%H5619>surely<s%> be <S%H5619>stoned<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> <S%H3384>through;<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he shall not <S%H2421>live.<s%>' When the ram's <S%H3104>horn<s%> <S%H4900>sounds<s%> a <S%H4900>long<s%> <S%H4900>blast,<s%> they shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%> "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H8071>garments.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Be <S%H3559>ready<s%> for the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> do not <S%H5066>go<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> a <S%H802>woman.<s%>"

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when it was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that there were <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H1300>lightning<s%> <S%H1300>flashes<s%> and a <S%H3515>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2389>loud<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H6963>sound,<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H2729>trembled.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and they <S%H3320>stood<s%> at the <S%H8482>foot<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

Now <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> [was] <S%H3605>all<s%> in <S%H6225>smoke<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> upon it in <S%H784>fire;<s%> and its <S%H6227>smoke<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> like the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H2729>quaked<s%> <S%H3966>violently.<s%>

When the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H1980>grew<s%> <S%H2388>louder<s%> and <S%H3966>louder,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him with <S%H6963>thunder.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up.

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3381>"Go<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H5749>warn<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H2040>break<s%> <S%H2040>through<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H7200>gaze,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> of them <S%H5307>perish.<s%>

"And <S%H1571>also<s%> let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> themselves, <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6555>break<s%> out against them."

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> up to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> for Thou didst <S%H5749>warn<s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1379>'Set<s%> <S%H1379>bounds<s%> about the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> it.'"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H3381><s%> <S%H1980>down<s%> and <S%H5927>come<s%> up [again,] you and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> with you; but do not let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2040>break<s%> <S%H2040>through<s%> to <S%H5927>come<s%> up to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> He <S%H6555>break<s%> <S%H6555>forth<s%> upon them."
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H1980>down<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> them.
